item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260226.1)
item.description:
What's New

fix: prevent mark placement on consonant in 'ngin' pattern (nginx flicker bug)

  • Add vowelCount=0 guard in insertMarkInternal: when findAndCalculateVowel

returns no vowel AND vowelEndIndex > 1 (indicating 'i' is deep inside word

after multi-char consonant like 'ng'), skip mark placement entirely.

This prevents invalid words like 'ngĩn' from being produced.

  • Add getCharacterCode safety net in handleMarkKey: if mark lands on a

consonant with no code table entry, restore state and insert key as-is.

  • Key distinction: vowelEndIndex=1 (gi at word start) allows marks for valid

words like 'gì' and 'gìn'. vowelEndIndex>1 (ngin) skips marks.

  • Add 5 test cases: nginx, ngix (skip mark), nghĩ, gì, gìn (allow mark)
